评论详情: excellent

My niece loves dinosaurs but everything you find is like really boyish dinosaurs. So anything I ever find that is girly dinosaurs I definitely get it for her! Good quality and she absolutely loves wearing it!
Sweet little top. My Granddaughter loves it

I ordered this for my niece for Christmas and when I opened up the bag it stunk so so bad. I definitely would have never sent this out to someone. It is dry clean only, the shirt is not soft. The color is very pretty, the material is not thick like a sweater but if it didn’t smell so bad it would be worth the money.

评论概述: Pretty Pink Very Soft Well Made
评论详情: After trying two other embroidered kitten sweatshirts that were too stiff from the embroidery and tight weave fabric, this sweatshirt was Perfect. So soft, the right amount of stretch to the pullover to make it wearable.  A perfect girly pink color. Our little 2.5 year old grand daughter loves it!! She has worn it 3 times in 5 days.

评论概述: Cute but not a heavy sweater
评论详情: The design looks great in person. The sweater is not a thick material so use an undershirt if you’re looking for warmth

评论概述: This looks silly the cats eyes were crossed
评论详情: I didn't care for that at all.

I recently bought two sweaters for my girls in sizes 2T and 4T, and I’m thrilled with them! They’re warm, snuggly, and cute, fitting both girls nicely despite being a bit oversized. After washing, the color stayed vibrant, and there was no shrinkage. These sweaters are perfect for the holidays, and I would definitely buy more from this seller!
She loves this and wants to wear every day.  So cute

This top is rough, hard, and the inside is scratchy where the very heavy giraffe emblems are seen in.  I would not let any child wear this.  The picture is cute but the execution of the top is all wrong.
Love the quality, still looks new after wash
Love this so much on my granddaughter! I bought a size 6 and it fits perfect. She is 4 and wears a size 5. The pink is great and is exactly as shown. She loves it!
Even after the initial wash, the color ran and got on other parts of the shirt as shown in pictures. Unfortunately I am outside of my return window… what a waste.
Very cute and comfy. Fits on the looser side. We LOVE it!

So, I have a toddler and I was lookimg for 100% cotton clothing, which this company labeled this item as such. When I got it home, it was 95% cotton 5% polyester. You might say what the...? But, I didnt trust the product after that. Your choice. Price point is okay. Color and image were really nice.

I bought this as a Christmas gift for my granddaughter who loves dinosaurs. She’s going to LOVE it. The girly pattern and color are perfect for a Dino loving little princess. I know she will be happy wearing it all winter long—an easy wash and wear top that’s made of high quality, super soft, and made to fit fabric.
Not only were the sequins of poor quality but the edges of the heart were sharp and harsh. And the sequins kept turning. A bit disappointing
I loved the fit of the sweater it was true to size. Great wear and she loved it. I had to buy several more in different designs.
Love it!

评论概述: Tear in seam before worn even once
评论详情: Since this is for my baby, I washed the sweatshirt before she was to wear it (gentle, cold cycle). Pulling the sweatshirt out of the washing machine, there was already a huge tear in the shoulder/ arm seam. I returned it and received a replacement, so I am giving it one more try. The pattern is super cute, but if this one also comes apart after one wash, I will be returning and not replacing. The sweatshirt is very thin.
Our Toddler loves this shirt. We let her pick her shirts out every morning and if this one is clean, she'll immediately pick this one out.
Gifted for Valentine’s Day has held up well. Girls love the sequins!
This product is absolutely adorable. Fit and quality are perfect!
My first grade granddaughter loves this sweatshirt! It’s pink and has dinosaurs so what’s not to love. It’s the perfect weight for Texas winters and a/c classrooms.

评论概述: Depends on which design you order
评论详情: I ordered two, dinosaur pink (no ruffle) and dinosaur white(with the ruffle on the shoulder).  The dinosaur pink sweatshirt is so soft and cozy. It is not too thin and not too thick. The dinosaur white is much thinner, more like a long sleeve shirt than a sweatshirt. For both designs the colors and design are exactly as pictured. Very vibrant and pretty. I wish the white one was a sweatshirt but it will be nice when the weather warms up.

评论概述: Cute but the gold is coming off
评论详情: My daughter has had this sweater for about two months and it is really cute. My only complaint is that the parts with the gold color is wearing off already. It is white underneath which is less cute than the gold. The shirt is still wearable even with this happening and the other colors are still holding just fine. If not for the gold wearing off I would have given it five stars.

评论概述: Really cute, sparkly but one step of caution
评论详情: This is a pretty color of pink. Very sparkly. Lots of red sequins. We turn it inside out and stick it in a laundry bag before putting it into the washer and lay it flat to dry.
The fit was great
Terrible screen print quality. Tag says dry clean only. Who has time for that with a toddler? I took my chance and one wash made the screen print wrinkled even on delicate cycle & hang dry
Fits well and is super comfortable for my daughter She can't wait to wear it to her Valentines Day party at school!
Got for my niece, and she absolutely loves it
Suuuuper cute. Inside is smooth where the embroidery is stitched on. A little narrow at the neck/wrists but our little one is in the 90th percentile.
Recommend getting a bigger size. My kid is 26 lbs and 2 years old and a 2T was way too small. It got more like a 18 months
Fue muy linda, cómoda y de muy buena calidad. La compré para el cumpleaños de mi niña y le encantó. Fue una buena inversión.
Love the dinosaur print on a pink item, and so did the kids!
Perfect for my granddaughter!  Well made- true to size!
I brought this shirt for my granddaughter. It's so cute.
Adorable cute dinosaur sweatshirt for my granddaughter! Love it!
So cute and nice material
This is a great shirt. My daughter loves it and is one of her favorites to wear. The only thing about it is the gold print in the unicorns hair came off after one wash. It was washed inside out.
My 2yr old love it I also ordered the rainbow and giraffes to much cuteness
I love this shirt! The quality is very impressive and the cat design my granddaughter will love. I bought both the 5 and 6 sizes and will decide at holiday time which one will work out.
Nicer than expected and fits great! I wouldn't hesitate to purchase again.
Such a cute sweatshirt for a little dino lover. The little ruffles are absolutely adorable. The sweatshirt is a bit thin but that's ok. Purchased as a gift and she loved it.
Good quality, so soft. Very cute, my granddaughters will love these
This sweatshirt is so adorable. My niece loves it!
Too small. Def size up. We returned it bc my daughter prob would’ve only been able to wear it once before she grew out of it
My daughter loves it! It's comfy, very pink and so so cute! She's 6 and we got the size 6 year old and it fits perfectly! Looks exactly like the picture!
This shirt is really cute, but it's more like a slightly thicker long-sleeved shirt than it is a sweatshirt. It isn't thick or warm at all. This defeats the purpose of which we purchased it.
Cute.  Well made.  Soft.  Love it!

评论概述: Cute but the gold came off and not warm
评论详情: My daughter loves this shirt. Good to note that it isn’t a sweatshirt with fleecy material on the inside. It is more of a French terry material so not as warm. I washed on delicate with cold water and air dried and the gold on the unicorn mane started coming off. We needed it for camping that weekend so we went with it, but it was disappointing quality
Loved it
I ordered 2 identical sweatshirts in different sizes 2T and 5T and they were made from different materials!!!  5T softer and warmer. But 2T easy.  Differ considerably. Necks and bottoms are different
Thin and flimsy, polyester shirt. Good for a mid 60s slightly chilly spring or fall day at best. Anything colder, this won't be of much use.
Cute- true to size My daughter wears 4T-5T & i purchased a 4T & it fit perfect 👍
fits well granddaughter loves it.
One time use product. After the first wash the golden print on the unicorn peeled off entirely and the hot pink print stained the white unicorn. So disappointed. Do not waste your money!

评论概述: Worst screen print ever. The screen print is peeling.
评论详情: We bought this for my daughter to wear to her birthday party. I don’t want to even let her wear it since the screen print is peeling.

I bought this for my 2 year old and the material is awesome.  The print is cute and has withheld many washes without fading or stretching out. Highly recommend, especially if your kids loves dinos like mine does.
Ruined after one wash. :( Dry clean only for a sweatshirt??

评论概述: It says IOAR instead of ROAR
评论详情: Super cute and cozy, but I don’t know what dinosaur said “ROAI” or “IOAR”. My daughter doesn’t care either way though.
I bought this for my LO who loves Marie. It fits great and is very soft and warm on the inside.
Very very cute.  15 month old loves her zoo and farm animals. Normally she wears 2 T. This was roomy but that’s fine because we shrink everything in the dryer😅.
I bought it for my 6 year old granddaughter and she loves cats. She loves this sweatshirt as she says it is very comfy.
It’s a little large but still is well made and will looks cute w a pair of leggings.

This is a cute and good quality sweatshirt but when my daughter got home from school I noticed the gold on the unicorn peeling and it was her first wear. Sucks because I loved the design and quality, but she doesn't want it anymore.
Adorable, fit as expected.
Great and warm fitting.
True to size. Mildly warm. Can wear indoors

This is SO CUTE!! It’s nice quality from what I can tell without wear and wash. We have limited truly COLD days so this will be perfect for keeping my girl warm but not overheated while playing when it’s cool/chilly. Lightweight but doesn’t feel cheap and sizing is accurate when compared to other brands
Very cute colors but did dinos say roai or ioar??

评论概述: Gold is peeling off the first day with normal wear. Awaiting seller's response.
评论详情: Fits to true size but gold is peeling off on the first day with normal wear. Very disappointing for my granddaughter.

评论概述: Cute design, but super thin (polyester) material
评论详情: I wish this was more of a sweater, as in thicker, and more cottony/softer. This was more like thin, slick polyester (the material you’d imagine a cheap Halloween costume would be made of). It won’t keep your little one warm by any means, but it is a super cute dinosaur design
Nice weight sweatshirt.  I bought it to fit my 3 year a little big so she wouldn’t grow out of it as fast.  Very cozy, cute design!
Daughter wears 4-5 T and this fits perfectly.
Fits like it should and super cute
Adorable detail and fits perfectly. Super cute and girly, love it
Colors are not as vibrant as in the pictures also it’s very light. Not insulated and cheap fabric. If you are looking for winter weather wear, this is not it.
The sweatshirt is cute but I didn’t receive exactly what was pictured. The picture shows appliqués for the scales. The short I received is entirely screen print.
The adorable little girl who received this wears it all the time and is very happy with it! I’m so happy that I found it for her birthday!

This shirt is as pictured and great for cooler weather. Great for layering over a t shirt or under a jacket. My girls loved to wear it around the house this winter. So cute and ok priced. True to size.
Really surprised me, great softness & quality
My 2 year old is obsessed with wearing clothes with cats on it.  So this sweater is a hit!  It shrinks a little after washing it.

My daughter absolutely loves this sweatshirt. The color is bright and blue, the cat on it is adorable. Its not very warm but you can layer up. For her its still a little bit but she's on the smaller side so I guess that's okay.

评论概述: Super cute, quality could be improved tho
评论详情: Super cute sweatshirt! Does run slightly smaller than expected. Ordered a 3t for my 2t wearing girlie and it fit nicely, a bit long but still looked good! My only concern is that seams are not all perfect (as you can see in the picture) but so far so good, no rips, just extra threads.  Recommended but be aware about sizing!  P.S. If this review was good for you at all, please do hit the "helpful" button so I know that I'm not wasting my time posting this! Thanks in advance :)

Adorable cat sweatshirt. I love the sewn on cat and the polka dots on the body of the shirt add a cute touch.  The fabric is either french terry or like a french terry.  It is not too bulky and can easily be layered over a t-shirt.  The fit was good, I did order 1 size up to account for any shrinkage, my daughter is 4 and I got the 5t.

My daughter is 4 years old, and I bought size 4T, and bigger for her. It is made of cotton, very soft, and comfortable. Machine wash cold. Hand wash recommended. I didn’t notice this before I ordered. The cartoon pattern is very cute. Children will like them. The inside is messy(shown in the picture). Don’t purchase if you mind this issue.
This sweater is so amazing and cute. My girls love it!

This sweatshirt is so cute! I got it for my 4 yo daughter. I ordered up a couple sizes for a more oversized fit. She’s an average size for 4 yo. It is a great quality and perfect for fall. It is not a thick and fuzzy sweatshirt. It’s thinner material and can be worn on warmer days. She says it is soft and cozy! Win for my picky little girl. 10/10 would reccomend.

My daughter can always use sweatshirt like this one. She just recently started to like unicorns too because one of her school friends loves those. This one seems like the right fit and very good material. Great buy! No problems so far.
This is a great basic yet cute sweater for my daughter's fall/winter wardrobe. It fits her perfectly and is very comfortable for her to wear.

I got this for my daughter-in-law, and the following is her review:  I ordered this toddler sweatshirt for my daughter as it is becoming cooler outside. The cat is super cute on the shirt, and I love the bright blue color with the white polka-dots. It is a very vibrant, nicely colored top. I ordered the 4-5t, and it fits true to size. The fabric is a lot thinner than I was expecting for a sweatshirt. The description says it is a sweatshirt for most seasons like autumn, winter, and spring; however, it is not thick and feels more like regular t-shirt material. It is a cute shirt, though I would not recommend it for warmth as it does not feel like a sweatshirt. It is also 100% cotton, so be sure to keep that in mind when washing and drying, as it could shrink. The instructions recommend you hang dry it to avoid shrinkage. It isn’t an overly soft or stretchy shirt, but I love the design and colors. 4-stars!

This sweatshirt is more like a thicker shirt. I imagine the inside isn’t super comfortable as the inner stitching of the cat shows through and feels rough. The cat is super sweet though and has a fuzzy feel to it, kids love it! Super sweet design on a bright color! You will probably need a tshirt underneath for this to be comfortable to wear. Picture is of the reverse side of the sweatshirt.

I ordered this top for my 3 year old daughter. She usually wears 3 or 4T clothes. This top is just the right size for her. I typically order a size up but I’m glad I got the 3 in this. The top is a beautiful light pink with an adorable cartoon cat on it. It is not really a sweatshirt as it’s thinner and doesn’t have a soft inside. It is more of a thicker long sleeved shirt. It’s very lightweight and will be perfect for cooler weather here in Florida. I would recommend this, it’s a great price for good quality!
